00026 #ifndef __L4_SYS__INCLUDE__ARCH_X86__UTCB_H__
00027 #define __L4_SYS__INCLUDE__ARCH_X86__UTCB_H__
00028 
00029 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00030 
00041 enum L4_utcb_consts_x86
00042 {
00044   L4_UTCB_EXCEPTION_REGS_SIZE    = 16,
00045 
00047   L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE      = 63,
00048 
00050   L4_UTCB_GENERIC_BUFFERS_SIZE   = 58,
00051 
00053   L4_UTCB_MSG_REGS_OFFSET        = 0,
00054 
00056   L4_UTCB_BUF_REGS_OFFSET        = 64 * sizeof(l4_umword_t),
00057 
00059   L4_UTCB_THREAD_REGS_OFFSET     = 123 * sizeof(l4_umword_t),
00060 
00062   L4_UTCB_INHERIT_FPU            = 1UL << 24,
00063 
00065   L4_UTCB_OFFSET                 = 512,
00066 };
00067 
00072 typedef struct l4_exc_regs_t
00073 {
00074   l4_umword_t gs;      
00075   l4_umword_t fs;      
00077   l4_umword_t edi;     
00078   l4_umword_t esi;     
00079   l4_umword_t ebp;     
00080   l4_umword_t pfa;     
00081   l4_umword_t ebx;     
00082   l4_umword_t edx;     
00083   l4_umword_t ecx;     
00084   l4_umword_t eax;     
00086   l4_umword_t trapno;  
00087   l4_umword_t err;     
00089   l4_umword_t ip;     
00090   l4_umword_t dummy1;  
00091   l4_umword_t flags;  
00092   l4_umword_t sp;     
00093 } l4_exc_regs_t;
00094 
00095 #include_next <l4/sys/utcb.h>
00096 
00097 /*
00098  * ==================================================================
00099  * Implementations.
00100  */
00101 
00102 L4_INLINE l4_utcb_t *l4_utcb_direct(void) L4_NOTHROW
00103 {
00104   l4_utcb_t *utcb;
00105   __asm__ __volatile__ ("mov %%fs:0, %0" : "=r" (utcb));
00106   return utcb;
00107 }
00108 
00109 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t l4_utcb_exc_pc(l4_exc_regs_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00110 {
00111   return u->ip;
00112 }
00113 
00114 L4_INLINE void l4_utcb_exc_pc_set(l4_exc_regs_t *u, l4_addr_t pc) L4_NOTHROW
00115 {
00116   u->ip = pc;
00117 }
00118 
00119 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t l4_utcb_exc_typeval(l4_exc_regs_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00120 {
00121   return u->trapno;
00122 }
00123 
00124 L4_INLINE int l4_utcb_exc_is_pf(l4_exc_regs_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00125 {
00126   return u->trapno == 14;
00127 }
00128 
00129 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t l4_utcb_exc_pfa(l4_exc_regs_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00130 {
00131   return (u->pfa & ~3) | (u->err & 2);
00132 }
00133 
00134 #endif /* ! __L4_SYS__INCLUDE__ARCH_X86__UTCB_H__ */
